name: Zomb.io
description:
Please check out our new game for those who looking for a pure arcade-styled action and all agario fans! Zombi.io is a fast-paced, top down action game with tons of upgrades and challenging enemies.

Prepare for a zombie tsunami! Your goal in this game is to gain as much mass as possible by swallowing smaller zombie balls without being swallowed by bigger ones.

**HOW TO PLAY** Swipe to move a zombie ball.

Game features:
-tactical action
-scary zombie chars
-survival hunting game
-absolutely free

Eat and grow bigger with Zomb.io! The spirit of a conqueror lives in you, my friend!
